document.docAuthor: Olmi, Massimo, Mita, Toshiharu & Guglielmino, Adalgisa
document.masterDocTitle: Revision of the Embolemidae of Japan (Hymenoptera: Chrysidoidea), with description of a new genus and two new species

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Revision of the Embolemidae of Japan (Hymenoptera: Chrysidoidea), with description of a new genus and two new species

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type species
.
Embolemus ruddii
Westwood, 1833
, by monotypy.

Hosts . Nymphs of
Cixiidae (
Varrone & Olmi 2012
)
.
World species . Thirty-four species are known (including one putative fossil species in Baltic amber), seven in Japan and two in Russian Far East.
